docs.text: Greetings - Les salutations The following are the common greetings in french: There are a lot of ways to say "Hi". English Spanish French Hello hola salut Good morning Buenos días bonjour Bye Hasta luego Au revoir How are you? ¿Cómo te va? Comment ça va Good night Buenas noches Bonne nuit
docs.title: Greetings

docs.text: Common expresions The following are the common expresions in french: English Spanish French Thanks Gracias Merci Thanks Muchas Gracias Merci beaucoup Please Por favor S’il vous plaît You are welcome De nada-Congusto de rien
